scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_9_: * You drank the hot chocolate^1.&* It tasted wonderful^1.&* Your throat tightened.../%
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_34: * You held out the flowers^1.&* A floral scent fills the air^1.&* Nothing happened./%
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_42: * You looked at the junk ball in admiration^1.&* Nothing happened./%
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_96: * For some strange reason^1, for just a brief moment.../
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_97: * You thought you saw through your hand./%
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_82: \E0* Hello?&* Dreemurr residence...&* Who might this be...?/
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_84: \E5* Sigh... Do not make me come over there./
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_93: * (The phone is ringing^1, but you can't get it.)/
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_94: * (You're already on the phone^1, after all...)/%
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_11: \E3* What^1? No^1, I am not giving you a ride home./
\E1* Our house is not far^1. It is just at the top of town./
\E4* Try walking^1. It builds character^1, honey./
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_12: \E0* I can talk to you when you get back^1, alright?/
\E0* Our house is only at the top of town^1, you know./
